Holiday Lights.desc: The City of Barberton hosts a display of multi-colored holiday lights through New Years Day as part of the annual Lake Anna Holiday Light Display at Lake Anna Park in Barberton. For more info see the Parks Events Page.

<i class='icon-star'></i> City Closed.desc:
City offices will be closed Tuesday, December 24 and Wenesday December 25 in observance of Christmas

The Utilities department will also be closed Monday December 23.

<i class='icon-bullhorn'></i> Magics Ale.desc: The City of Barberton has begun using Nixle to provide community notifications. This service will help the City communicate electronically with the citizens in a timely manner. For more information and to sign up, please visit the community notifications page.

Bid Request.desc:
Sealed bids for the City of Barberton Downtown Towpath Trail Connector will be received until 3:00 PM on December 18, 2013 at Barberton City Hall, 576 Park Avenue, Barberton, Ohio 44203
For more details see the full notice

Change for Change.desc:
This month's Change for Change we be held at the Green Diamond. Funds will be donated to Greynolds Classic.
November 22, 4:30-7:00

<i class='icon-warning-sign'></i> Road C.desc:
To allow CSX Railroad to perform routine maintenance on tracks at Snyder and Fairview Ave., the following road closures will begin mid-morning on Monday, October 28 and will continue through Wednesday, October 30.

Barricades will be placed at:
Snyder & 2nd Street
Snyder and South Van Buren
Fairview & North Van Buren
Fairview & Coventry
Fairview at the Metro Park Trail
